text: anybody who's ever had to cut down a
road has had a difficult time it was
quite a surprise to me because I hadn't
thought to ask how many women there
would be and so I didn't know that it
would be 1% I never felt welcome as a
woman I felt many of My Views
were too different if you'd say
something stupid you'd think oh my gosh
this is going to hurt the reputation of
all women at HBS forever pioneering can
be very internally rewarding for you but
you've got to be extremely strong about
who you are when you're really a
minority in that in this kind of
environment you learn a lot about what
kind of woman you want to be I feel like
there's a lot of responsibility that
goes
with being one of the early people to be
given this wonderful opportunity I still
really feel an obligation to just
Mentor the next generation of women and
get them to be bold and and dream big
and realize that you can't have
everything that you aspire to in life
but women can have so much more than
they think they can I think at the time
I came thinking that I was getting an
MBA so that I could get maybe a certain
kind of job or work in a certain kind of
company and I think uh my life's
experience has taught me that in fact
what was wonderful and valuable about
having been here was the choices I've
been able to make in my life women that
I know friends women who I am mentoring
still are tempted to think of life and
their careers as a series of tradeoffs
and I'm not really sure that men think
that way to me success is is feeling
like a whole person making a difference
but feeling good in your skin you know
having that type of and I hate to use
the cliche but for me it works balance I
I would hope that in 50 years you
wouldn't have to define success by
gender that it would be success by who
whoever you are and in your own terms I
do think it's possible to have a great
career and and have a great family not
be a good mother or be a good CEO but I
think it's possible to do your best and
achieve a lot along multiple dimensions
and to lead a big life
